definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: Hb Hab 1:9 (of the Chaldaeans) [[מְגַמַּת פְּנֵיהֶם קָדִָימָה]], of uncertain meaning: Ges the assembling of their faces is (directed) forwards; Ew De Ke eagerness, comparing (questionably) [[גׇּמָא]] swallow Job 39:4, and ja0ma (Freyt.) seek (whence St prop. [[מְגֻמַת]]). Text prob. erron.
